description: Men.com's tribute to the work and legacy of legendary gay porn visionary Tom of Finland continues as director Matt Lambert ventures into the territory of the postmodern with CockyBoys Exclusive Sean Ford, Angel Rivera, Tannor Reed, River Wilson, and Joey Mills. The nude twinks hang out at the Pleasure Park, shooting the breeze, challenging each other to self-suck, and bonding over the question, "What would you do if the world was ending tomorrow?" As the day turns to night, the sunny teen sex party turns into a rock-n-roll-fueled orgy!
title: Tom Of Finland: Pleasure Park
